directions: Spread the refried beans at the bottom of a 10x10 baking pan or large bowl. Add a layer of guacamole followed by a layer of tomatoes, olives, and sour cream. Top with shredded cheese. Serve with Pretzel Crisps(R).
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Snack Factory® Everything Pretzel Crisps®
title: Mexican-Style Layered Dip
